Name: LU 705 - Zoning, 1501-1555 60th Street Rezoning, Brooklyn (C 200086 ZMK)
Title: Resolution approving with modifications the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 200086 ZMK, a Zoning Map amendment (Preconsidered L.U. No. 705).

History.Action: Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by Roll Call.

Attachments.Name: December 10, 2020 - Stated Meeting Agenda with Links to Files

\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
\b By Council Members Salamanca and Moya\b0\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\par
\tab WHEREAS, 1529-33 60th Street, LLC, \expndtw-6 filed an application \expndtw0 pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 22d, changing from an M1-1 District to an R7A District and establishing within the proposed R7A District a C2-4 District, which in conjunction with the related action would facilitate the construction of three mixed-use buildings containing a total of approximately 102 residential dwelling units and 32,219 square feet of ground floor commercial space on 60th Street in the Borough Park neighborhood of Brooklyn Community District 12 (ULURP No. C 200086 ZMK) (the "Application");\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx720\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720 WHEREAS the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on December 9, 2020, its decision dated November 18, 2020 (the "Decision") on the Application;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tqr\tx9360\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720 WHEREAS, the Application is related to application N 200087 ZRK (Pre. L.U. No. 706), a zoning text amendment to designate a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing (MIH) area;\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720 WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720 WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on December 7, 2020 and on December 16, 2020;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720 WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720 WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the negative declaration issued January 6\super th\nosupersub , 2020 (CEQR No. 18DCP038K), which includes an (E) designation to avoid the potential for significant adverse impacts related to hazardous materials, air quality, and noise, and (E-556) (the \ldblquote Negative Declaration\rdblquote ).\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1260\tx1440\tx1620  \par
RESOLVED:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720 The Council finds that the action described herein will have no significant impact on the environment as set forth in the (E) Designation (E-556) and Negative Declaration.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720 Pursuant to Sections 197-d and 200 of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in the report, C 200086 ZMK, incorporated by reference herein, and the record before the Council, the Council approves the Decision of the City Planning Commission with the following modifications:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar Matter \ul underlined\ulnone  is new, to be added;\par
Matter \strike struck out\strike0  is to be deleted;\par
Matter double struck out is old, deleted by the City Council\par
Matter \uldb double-underlined\ulnone  is new, added by the City Council\fs32\par
\fs24 Matter within # # is defined in Section 12-10;\par
*     *     * indicates where unchanged text appears in the Zoning Resolution.\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720\par
\pard\ltrpar\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\ri140\qj\tx720\tx7560 The Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, effective as of December 15, 1961, and as subsequently amended, is further amended by changing the Zoning Map, Section No. 22d: \par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720 1.\tab changing from an M1-1 District to an R7A District property bounded by \uldb a line 100 feet southeasterly of \ulnone 15th Avenue, \uldb 60\super th\nosupersub  Street, a line 200 feet southeasterly of 15\super th\nosupersub  Avenue, \ulnone a line midway between 59th Street and 60th Street, a line 460 feet southeasterly of 15th Avenue, 60th Street, and the northerly boundary line of the Long Island Railroad right-of-way (Bay Ridge Division);  \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720 2.\tab establishing within the proposed R7A District a C2-4 District bounded by \uldb a line 100 feet southeasterly of \ulnone 15\super th\nosupersub  Avenue, \uldb 60\super th\nosupersub  Street, a line 200 feet southeasterly of 15\super th\nosupersub  Avenue, \ulnone a line midway between 59\super th\nosupersub  Street and 60\super th\nosupersub  Street, a line 460 feet southeasterly of 15\super th\nosupersub  Avenue, 60\super th\nosupersub  Street, and the northerly boundary line of the Long Island Railroad right-of-way (Bay Ridge Division);  \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx810 as shown on a diagram (for illustrative purposes only) dated January 6, 2020, and subject to the conditions of CEQR Declaration E-556, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 12.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\ri140\qj\tx720\tx7560\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj Adopted.\par
\par
\tab Office of the City Clerk, \}\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj The City of New York,  \} ss.:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par

\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\par
